column2: The most popular person in the history of the Republican Party is Trump.

column2: In some states, Democrats are even trying to give illegal immigrants the right to vote.

column2: We've taken the toughestever actions in response to China's abusive trade practices.

column2: We got $1.6 billion and we've started large portions of the wall, but we're going to need  even the way we negotiate, we're going to need more and we're going to get more and we may have to do some pretty drastic things, but we're going to get it.
column4: Weve already started (the border wall). We started it in San Diego.

column2: Every day, the brave men and women of ICE are liberating communities and towns from savage gangs like MS13 that are occupying our country like another nation would.
column4: I have watched ICE liberate towns from the grasp of MS13.
